memberRank.memberExistError: There are members under this rank, it is forbidden to delete

login.signupUserExist: Username or email address had been registered

login.disabledAccount: This account has been disabled, please contact the administrator
login.userBanned: Your account has been deactivated or is under review, please contact the administrator.
